name: A. Madoka and Strange Thoughts
statement:
Madoka is a very strange girl, and therefore she suddenly wondered how
many pairs of integers (a, b) exist, where 1
leq a, b
leq n, for which
frac{
operatorname{lcm}(a, b)}{
operatorname{gcd}(a, b)}
leq 3.In this problem,
operatorname{gcd}(a, b) denotes the greatest common divisor of the
numbers a and b, and
operatorname{lcm}(a, b) denotes the smallest common multiple of the
numbers a and b.
